Reviews.Title: Pleased in Atlanta
Reviews.Author: Clay Helms
Reviews.Content: I used an SLR camera for many years. When digital point and shoot started making the scene I started using them. I like both. The Cannon T3 is the affordable best of both worlds camera. The bundle that includes two lenses, two batteries, a backpack and more made my purchase even better. I have no "buyers remorse" at all. Now I am ready for the two graduations, a wedding, a championship T-Ball tournament and a championship Hockey match that are happening in my family over the next few months.

Reviews.Title: great deal
Reviews.Author: Tavo
Reviews.Content: sweet camera, but my only complain is that the RF sensor is not there anymore, still good package price and great pics
